name: Screenz
description: Screenz is a HR Tool that allows you to automate interviews using a dynamic 1-1 live interviews and cut hiring time in half.

currentProject.name: Rob Griesmeyer
currentProject.description: Your 24/7 AI interviewer for first-round candidate screening. Conduct dynamic 1-1 live interviews in 74 languages, auto-score responses, and eliminate bias. Sleep while AI qualifies top talent and delivers ranked results to your dashboard.
